title: Create Predictive Warning System
description: Implement a system that predicts potential issues before they occur based on patterns, system state, and historical data
notes:
Successfully implemented predictive warning system with:
- Created predictor.py with pattern recognition for memory leaks, CPU overload, cascade failures, and resource exhaustion
- Implemented history_manager.py for data collection, storage, and retrieval
- Built trend analysis using linear regression for metric predictions
- Integrated predictor into health_checker.py for real-time predictions
- Added predictions to health check results and dashboard
- All validation criteria met: accurate predictions, configurable thresholds, clear warnings, actionable steps, and historical tracking
